vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.2;
son of: Japheth (H3315);
brother of: Magog (H4031), Madai (H4074), Javan (H3120), Tubal (H8422), Meshech (H4902) and Tiras (H8494);
father of: Ashkenaz (H0813), Riphath (H7384A) and Togarmah (H8425)
§ Gomer = "complete"
n pr m
1) the eldest son of Japheth and grandson of Noah; the progenitor of the early Cimmerians and other branches of the Celtic family
n pr f
2) the unfaithful wife of the prophet Hosea; Hosea's relationship with her was symbolic of God's relationship with wayward Israel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Jafet; (b)   esposa de Oseas
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
歌篾 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "完全的"
陽性專有名詞
1) 雅弗的長子, 挪亞的孫子; ( # 創 10:2| )
陰性專有名詞
2) 先知何西阿的那個不忠的妻子( #何 1:3| ); 何西阿和她的關係像徵了上帝對暝頑不化的以色列人的關係.
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
歌篾 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "完全的"
阳性专有名词
1) 雅弗的长子, 挪亚的孙子; ( # 创 10:2| )
阴性专有名词
2) 先知何西阿的那个不忠的妻子( #何 1:3| ); 何西阿和她的关系像征了上帝对暝顽不化的以色列人的关系.

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Hos.1.3;
daughter of: Diblaim (H1691); married to Hosea (H1954J);
mother of: Jezreel (H3157K), Lo-ruhamah (H3819), Lo-ammi lo am.mi (לֹא עַמִּי "Not My People" H3818))
§ Gomer = "complete"
n pr m
1) the eldest son of Japheth and grandson of Noah; the progenitor of the early Cimmerians and other branches of the Celtic family
n pr f
2) the unfaithful wife of the prophet Hosea; Hosea's relationship with her was symbolic of God's relationship with wayward Israel
